entry.def: Judaism is the religion of the Jewish people. It is based on the Old Testament of the Bible and the Talmud.

means.word_mean: 1. Jews collectively who practice a religion based on the Torah and the Talmud
2. the monotheistic religion of the Jews having its spiritual and ethical principles embodied chiefly in the Torah and in the Talmud
